Text:
I hadn't seen the original so I found the story difficult to follow at first. I persevered though and the ending was definitely worth it, although I still found some of the subplots a little hard to follow.

One thing I didn't appreciate was the director injecting an overt pro-progressive taxation message into the film at every available opportunity.

Also: tits.
Ya no sound because I had it on mute great movie, def high budget
